text: Truman Eugene "Tex" Clevenger (July 9, 1932 â€“ August 24, 2019) was an American Major League Baseball relief pitcher and spot starter. He played for the Boston Red Sox, Washington Senators, Los Angeles Angels and New York Yankees from 1954 to 1962. Clevenger was diagnosed with Alzheimer's disease in 2008. He died from the disease on August 24, 2019 in Porterville, California at the age of 87. ==References== ==Other websites== *Tex Clevenger at Baseball Almanac Category:1932 births Category:2019 deaths Category:Deaths from Alzheimer's disease Category:Boston Red Sox players Category:Los Angeles Angels players Category:New York Yankees players Category:Washington Nationals players Category:Sportspeople from California
title: Tex Clevenger
